EmailTemplate.subject: Transform the way you pay your customers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Your customers rely on receiving and depositing quick and easy payments, but most methods are costly and time consuming for both you and them. NCR has created a better way to pay — NCR Pay360 <[[https://www.ncr.com/payments/pay360?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_March_Pay360_Payments&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> — that allows your customers to receive instant cash at over 25,000 ATMs with a simple code, no cards required. It integrates seamlessly into your existing user experience and turns payments from a challenge into a competitive advantage. Why cash? Because it matters to consumers: <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/cash-use-in-digital-future?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_March_Pay360_Payments&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> - Majority of consumers agree that cash is safe to use - Consumers believe cash protects privacy and financial security - Lower income consumers use cash more than credit or debit - Cash is easily understood and accepted virtually everywhere NCR Pay360 isn’t just for taking out cash, it works for putting cash into accounts too! One code gives your customers the ability to make a cash-in transactions at thousands of participating ATMs. Consumers value choice in how they get paid, and NCR Pay360 gives your customers the choice to instantly receive and deposit cash. Let’s talk about how easy it is to add cash to your payments mix. Contact us today! <[[https://www.ncr.com/payments/pay360?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2023_March_Pay360_Payments&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> Kind regards, NCR Payments Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
